page.title: My Trunks
page.description: View your assigned SIP trunks and their configuration

search.title: Search Trunks
search.placeholder: Search by name, username, or domain...

noTrunks.title: No trunks assigned
noTrunks.description: You don't have any SIP trunks assigned to your account yet.

states.trunkNotFound: Trunk not found or not assigned to you

sipAccountNotConfigured.title: SIP Account Not Configured
sipAccountNotConfigured.description: Authentication rules will be available once your SIP account is properly configured.

connectionConfig.title: Connection Configuration
connectionConfig.pbxDescription: Use these details to configure your PBX or SIP client to connect to this trunk.

codecs.title: Supported Codecs
codecs.description: Configure your PBX to use one or more of these supported audio codecs:

steps.1: Configure your PBX/SIP client with the connection details above
steps.2: Use the username and password provided (click the eye icon to reveal password)
steps.5: Configure at least one of the supported codecs: {codecs}

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you need assistance configuring your PBX or have any issues with this trunk, please contact our support team with the trunk name "{trunkName}" for reference.
